snippet: Southern California's 280 peninsular bighorn sheep will be given endangered species protection, Federal authorities say.    Reclusive bighorn herds from Palm Springs to the Mexican border are threatened by housing tracts, golf courses and other lo...
lead_paragraph: Southern California's 280 peninsular bighorn sheep will be given endangered species protection, Federal authorities say. Reclusive bighorn herds from Palm Springs to the Mexican border are threatened by housing tracts, golf courses and other loss of their desert mountain habitat. About 1,200 bighorns were counted in 1979.
abstract: Southern California's 280 peninsular bighorn sheep are given endangered species protection (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; 'Endangered' Status For Some Bighorn Sheep
